p: Annual mean temperature was higher for L. intermedia than for L. neivai, while the difference in annual precipitation was not statistically significant (Fig. 1, Table 1). Most records in the bottom left corner of the scatter plot (17.5–22.5 °C, 500–1,000 mm) are for L. neivai (27 out of 28); while most records in the top right corner of the scatter plot (22.5–27.5 °C, 2,000–2,500 mm) are for L. intermedia (7 out of 7).
